input.original_text:
I was super excited for a new nail spot on west end of Belleville.  I have gone to mi nails O'Fallon location in the past but didn't have the greatest experience but I got nails done then.

Today I called earlier to book for a spa pedi with anyone.  Not realizing Yenni is one highly recommended, but she only does nails not toes.  I had Anna (sp) who was kind and gentle. She took her time and listened.

The gentleman at the front is very nice and accommodating. He made sure I had a book to look at color options.   They have 9 pedi chairs and 9 nail tables. About 7 big screen tvs to view while being pampered.
Prices for the pedicures are about avg/reasonable.

They were running a sale until
Feb 2? About 40% off pedicures and there's more too. The spa is super clean and they did a nice job on the interior! I will definitely be back!! Great job mi nail!!

analysis.draft_response: What an awesome review! We love knowing that Anna took great care of you during your spa pedicure and that you noticed how sparkling clean our new Belleville space is. We appreciate you sharing your experience and look forward to welcoming you back to mi nail soon! üíÖ‚ú®
